definitions.title: vb.
definitions.body: melt, dissolve, be liquefied (Eth. masawa: liquefy; Aram. [[מְסָא]] melt away, mso0 dissolve, decay, coagulate; As. masû is wash; v. also [[מסס]]);—only

definitions.title: Hiph.
definitions.body: Pf. 3 pl. [[הִמְסִיו]] Jos 14:8 (on form v. Ges:§ 75 R.17). Impf. sf . [[יַּעמסֵם]] Ps 147:18; 2 ms. [[וַתֶּ֫מֶס]] Ps 39:12; [[אַמְסֶה]] Ps 6:7; —cause to dissolve, melt, ice Ps 147:18; hyperb. [[בְּדִמְעָתִי עַרְשִׁי אַמְּסֶה]] Ps 6:7 with my tears I cause my bed to dissolve; [[וַתֶּמֶס כָּעָשׁ חֲמוּדוֹ]] Ps 39:12 = consume, cause to vanish; fig. sq. [[לֵב]] = intimidate Jos 14:8.
